title: Inflation in late 1960s and early 1970s - cause

content.question: The high inflation rates of the late 1960s and early 1970s were due in part to

choices.label: major state and federal tax increases
spending on social-welfare programs and the Vietnam War
deregulation of key transportation and defense industries

content.answer: spending on social-welfare programs and the Vietnam War

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
